column4: Practice of using natural light, rather than electric lights, to illuminate a space.
Process of removing lamps from a light fixture--for example, using only 2 fluorescent tubes in a 3-tube fixture--wherever there is extra light.
The replacement of a HVAC system with one that is more energy efficient.
The installation of energy controls that increase the energy efficiency of a building.
Installation of solar equipment is specified as the type of modification to, or replacement of, a piece of equipment or building shell/system that increases energy efficiency.
The replacement or addition of insulation to a building to make it more energy efficient.
The replacement of lighting systems or fixtures with those that are more energy efficient.
The replacement of lamps that are not performing at peak performance.
The replacement of windows in a building with those that increase energy efficiency.
Other is specified as the type of modification to, or replacement of, a piece of equipment or building shell/system that increases energy efficiency.
